thread.title: Sarah
thread.title_full: Great British Meat Co. reviewed by Sarah

author: Sarah
title: Sarah
text:
I have purchased meat from this company on several occasions and
I am delighted with the quality. The chicken, for me, is exceptional.
The quality, the fact you can trust the British standard and of course
there are the excellent prices to consider. The ordering is easy,
the website simple to navigate and delivery is on time. All in all
I would recommend this company. Sarah Wilkin
